data.name: RogueClick Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the lite version of RogueClick, an incremental RPG where you start as a humble farmer and work your way toward becoming a powerful king! Click to swing your mighty sword and slay mystical creatures that drop coins and gems. These resources enable you to unlock new equipment to become stronger!

RogueClick Lite lets you play the first 2 levels, unlock 20 different pieces of equipment, and complete randomly generated quests for FREE!

To unlock the rest of RogueClick's features, purchase the full version!

data.short_description: An incremental RPG where you fight creatures, unlock equipment, and vanquish bosses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
